verses.verse: And the word <S%H1697><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> came unto me, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, prophesy <S%H5012><s%> <S%H8734><s%> against the shepherds <S%H7462><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, prophesy <S%H5012><s%> <S%H8734><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto them, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%> unto the shepherds <S%H7462><s%> <S%H8802><s%>; Woe <S%H1945><s%> be to the shepherds <S%H7462><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> that do feed <S%H7462><s%> <S%H8802><s%> themselves! should not the shepherds <S%H7462><s%> <S%H8802><s%> feed <S%H7462><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the flocks <S%H6629><s%> ?

Ye eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the fat <S%H2459><s%>, and ye clothe <S%H3847><s%> <S%H8799><s%> you with the wool <S%H6785><s%>, ye kill <S%H2076><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them that are fed <S%H1277><s%>: but ye feed <S%H7462><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not the flock <S%H6629><s%>.

The diseased <S%H2470><s%> <S%H8737><s%> have ye not strengthened <S%H2388><s%> <S%H8765><s%>, neither have ye healed <S%H7495><s%> <S%H8765><s%> that which was sick <S%H2470><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, neither have ye bound up <S%H2280><s%> <S%H8804><s%> that which was broken <S%H7665><s%> <S%H8737><s%>, neither have ye brought again <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8689><s%> that which was driven away <S%H5080><s%> <S%H8737><s%>, neither have ye sought <S%H1245><s%> <S%H8765><s%> that which was lost <S%H6><s%> <S%H8802><s%>; but with force <S%H2394><s%> and with cruelty <S%H6531><s%> have ye ruled <S%H7287><s%> <S%H8804><s%> them.

And they were scattered <S%H6327><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, because there is no shepherd <S%H7462><s%> <S%H8802><s%>: and they became meat <S%H402><s%> to all the beasts <S%H2416><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%>, when they were scattered <S%H6327><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

My sheep <S%H6629><s%> wandered <S%H7686><s%> <S%H8799><s%> through all the mountains <S%H2022><s%>, and upon every high <S%H7311><s%> <S%H8802><s%> hill <S%H1389><s%>: yea, my flock <S%H6629><s%> was scattered <S%H6327><s%> <S%H8738><s%> upon all the face <S%H6440><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>, and none did search <S%H1875><s%> <S%H8802><s%> or seek <S%H1245><s%> <S%H8764><s%> after them.
Therefore, ye shepherds <S%H7462><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8798><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>;

As I live <S%H2416><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> <S%H8803><s%> the YY <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>, surely because my flock <S%H6629><s%> became a prey <S%H957><s%>, and my flock <S%H6629><s%> became meat <S%H402><s%> to every beast <S%H2416><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%>, because there was no shepherd <S%H7462><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, neither did my shepherds <S%H7462><s%> <S%H8802><s%> search <S%H1875><s%> <S%H8804><s%> for my flock <S%H6629><s%>, but the shepherds <S%H7462><s%> <S%H8802><s%> fed <S%H7462><s%> <S%H8799><s%> themselves, and fed <S%H7462><s%> <S%H8804><s%> not my flock <S%H6629><s%>;
Therefore, O ye shepherds <S%H7462><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8798><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>;

Thus saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>; Behold, I am against the shepherds <S%H7462><s%> <S%H8802><s%>; and I will require <S%H1875><s%> <S%H8804><s%> my flock <S%H6629><s%> at their hand <S%H3027><s%>, and cause them to cease <S%H7673><s%> <S%H8689><s%> from feeding <S%H7462><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the flock <S%H6629><s%>; neither shall the shepherds <S%H7462><s%> <S%H8802><s%> feed <S%H7462><s%> <S%H8799><s%> themselves any more; for I will deliver <S%H5337><s%> <S%H8689><s%> my flock <S%H6629><s%> from their mouth <S%H6310><s%>, that they may not be meat <S%H402><s%> for them.

For thus saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>; Behold, I, even I, will both search <S%H1875><s%> <S%H8804><s%> my sheep <S%H6629><s%>, and seek them out <S%H1239><s%> <S%H8765><s%>.

As a shepherd <S%H7462><s%> <S%H8802><s%> seeketh out <S%H1243><s%> his flock <S%H5739><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> that he is among <S%H8432><s%> his sheep <S%H6629><s%> that are scattered <S%H6567><s%> <S%H8737><s%>; so will I seek out <S%H1239><s%> <S%H8762><s%> my sheep <S%H6629><s%>, and will deliver <S%H5337><s%> <S%H8689><s%> them out of all places <S%H4725><s%> where they have been scattered <S%H6327><s%> <S%H8738><s%> in the cloudy <S%H6051><s%> and dark <S%H6205><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>.

And I will bring them out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8689><s%> from the people <S%H5971><s%>, and gather <S%H6908><s%> <S%H8765><s%> them from the countries <S%H776><s%>, and will bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H8689><s%> them to their own land <S%H127><s%>, and feed <S%H7462><s%> <S%H8804><s%> them upon the mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> by the rivers <S%H650><s%>, and in all the inhabited places <S%H4186><s%> of the country <S%H776><s%>.

I will feed <S%H7462><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them in a good <S%H2896><s%> pasture <S%H4829><s%>, and upon the high <S%H4791><s%> mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> shall their fold <S%H5116><s%> be: there shall they lie <S%H7257><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in a good <S%H2896><s%> fold <S%H5116><s%>, and in a fat <S%H8082><s%> pasture <S%H4829><s%> shall they feed <S%H7462><s%> <S%H8799><s%> upon the mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.
I will feed <S%H7462><s%> <S%H8799><s%> my flock <S%H6629><s%>, and I will cause them to lie down <S%H7257><s%> <S%H8686><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> <S%H8803><s%> the YY <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>.

I will seek <S%H1245><s%> <S%H8762><s%> that which was lost <S%H6><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, and bring again <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8686><s%> that which was driven away <S%H5080><s%> <S%H8737><s%>, and will bind up <S%H2280><s%> <S%H8799><s%> that which was broken <S%H7665><s%> <S%H8737><s%>, and will strengthen <S%H2388><s%> <S%H8762><s%> that which was sick <S%H2470><s%> <S%H8802><s%>: but I will destroy <S%H8045><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the fat <S%H8082><s%> and the strong <S%H2389><s%>; I will feed <S%H7462><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them with judgment <S%H4941><s%>.

And as for you <S%H859><s%>, O my flock <S%H6629><s%>, thus saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>; Behold, I judge <S%H8199><s%> <S%H8802><s%> between cattle <S%H7716><s%> and cattle <S%H7716><s%>, between the rams <S%H352><s%> and the he goats <S%H6260><s%>.

Seemeth it a small thing <S%H4592><s%> unto you to have eaten up <S%H7462><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the good <S%H2896><s%> pasture <S%H4829><s%>, but ye must tread down <S%H7429><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with your feet <S%H7272><s%> the residue <S%H3499><s%> of your pastures <S%H4829><s%>? and to have drunk <S%H8354><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of the deep <S%H4950><s%> waters <S%H4325><s%>, but ye must foul <S%H7515><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the residue <S%H3498><s%> <S%H8737><s%> with your feet <S%H7272><s%> ?

And as for my flock <S%H6629><s%>, they eat <S%H7462><s%> <S%H8799><s%> that which ye have trodden <S%H4823><s%> with your feet <S%H7272><s%>; and they drink <S%H8354><s%> <S%H8799><s%> that which ye have fouled <S%H4833><s%> with your feet <S%H7272><s%>.

Therefore thus saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%> unto them; Behold, I, even I, will judge <S%H8199><s%> <S%H8804><s%> between the fat <S%H1274><s%> cattle <S%H7716><s%> and between the lean <S%H7330><s%> cattle <S%H7716><s%>.

Because ye have thrust <S%H1920><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with side <S%H6654><s%> and with shoulder <S%H3802><s%>, and pushed <S%H5055><s%> <S%H8762><s%> all the diseased <S%H2470><s%> <S%H8737><s%> with your shofars <S%H7161><s%>, till ye have scattered <S%H6327><s%> <S%H8689><s%> them abroad <S%H2351><s%>;

Therefore will I save <S%H3467><s%> <S%H8689><s%> my flock <S%H6629><s%>, and they shall no more be a prey <S%H957><s%>; and I will judge <S%H8199><s%> <S%H8804><s%> between cattle <S%H7716><s%> and cattle <S%H7716><s%>.

And I will set up <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8689><s%> one <S%H259><s%> shepherd <S%H7462><s%> <S%H8802><s%> over them, and he shall feed <S%H7462><s%> <S%H8804><s%> them, even my servant <S%H5650><s%> David <S%H1732><s%>; he shall feed <S%H7462><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them, and he shall be their shepherd <S%H7462><s%> <S%H8802><s%>.

And I the YY <S%H3068><s%> will be their 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, and my servant <S%H5650><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> a prince <S%H5387><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> them; I the YY <S%H3068><s%> have spoken <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> it.

And I will make <S%H3772><s%> <S%H8804><s%> with them a covenant <S%H1285><s%> of peace <S%H7965><s%>, and will cause the evil <S%H7451><s%> beasts <S%H2416><s%> to cease <S%H7673><s%> <S%H8689><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%>: and they shall dwell <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8804><s%> safely <S%H983><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>, and sleep <S%H3462><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in the woods <S%H3293><s%> <S%H8675><s%> <S%H3264><s%>.

And I will make <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> them and the places round about <S%H5439><s%> my hill <S%H1389><s%> a b'rakhah <S%H1293><s%>; and I will cause the shower <S%H1653><s%> to come down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8689><s%> in his season <S%H6256><s%>; there shall be showers <S%H1653><s%> of b'rakhah <S%H1293><s%>.

And the tree <S%H6086><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> shall yield <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> her fruit <S%H6529><s%>, and the earth <S%H776><s%> shall yield <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> her increase <S%H2981><s%>, and they shall be safe <S%H983><s%> in their land <S%H127><s%>, and shall know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> that I am the YY <S%H3068><s%>, when I have broken <S%H7665><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the bands <S%H4133><s%> of their yoke <S%H5923><s%>, and delivered <S%H5337><s%> <S%H8689><s%> them out of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of those that served <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8802><s%> themselves of them.

And they shall no more be a prey <S%H957><s%> to the heathen <S%H1471><s%>, neither shall the beast <S%H2416><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> devour <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them; but they shall dwell <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8804><s%> safely <S%H983><s%>, and none shall make them afraid <S%H2729><s%> <S%H8688><s%>.

And I will raise up <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8689><s%> for them a plant <S%H4302><s%> of renown <S%H8034><s%>, and they shall be no more consumed <S%H622><s%> <S%H8803><s%> with hunger <S%H7458><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%>, neither bear <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the shame <S%H3639><s%> of the heathen <S%H1471><s%> any more.

Thus shall they know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> that I the YY <S%H3068><s%> their 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> am with them, and that they, even the house <S%H1004><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, are my people <S%H5971><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> <S%H8803><s%> the YY <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>.

And ye <S%H859><s%> my flock <S%H6629><s%>, the flock <S%H6629><s%> of my pasture <S%H4830><s%>, are men <S%H120><s%>, and I am your 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> <S%H8803><s%> the YY <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>.
